thread.section_title: Hotel HELUSSI - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent hotel
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel - Review of Hotel HELUSSI, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mickael L
title: Excellent hotel
text: Found this hotel in Paris via trip advisor and I'm so happy we did. Service was excellent. Nice and cozy room. Very good location. Excellent value for money. Will definitely go back and recommend it to friends and family. Check prices on their own website because it was cheaper for us to book directly with them.
